title: Authme怎么延长登录和注册时间
author: T_irpitz
txt_content: 玩家老是来不及注册就给踢出去了

replies.author: wjwrh
replies.txt_content:
本帖最后由 wjwrh 于 2020-6-24 21:17 编辑 

authme\config.yml

        # After how many seconds should players who fail to login or register
        # be kicked? Set to 0 to disable.
        timeout: 30复制代码

改这个timeout就行 改为0则停用踢出功能

需要注意的是整个config文件中有两个timeout 是靠上面且初始值为30的那一个

replies.author: Salt_lovely
replies.txt_content:
在config.yml里面：
        # After how many seconds should players who fail to login or register
        # be kicked? Set to 0 to disable.
        timeout: 60复制代码
